seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with a minimum of 3 years of experience mentioned, which aligns with mid-level roles in the IC hierarchy.

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly mentions 'Business Intelligence' and core responsibilities focus on reporting, visualization, and BI tools like Cognos.

sub_specialty.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools (IBM InfoSphere DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) are required, with no strong emphasis on streaming or real-time.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role focuses on technical tasks like development, testing, and troubleshooting without explicit mention of leadership or direct reports.

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms (AWS, Google, Azure) are mentioned as preferred experience, but no single cloud is explicitly required.

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Azure, and Google (assumed GCP) are listed as preferred experience in the job posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Core focus on ETL/Data Integration tools and BI/DW projects suggests batch processing, with no explicit mention of streaming tools or paradigms.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are explicitly mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

storage_layer.evidence: Job posting mentions BI/DW projects, and required skills include Cognos (a BI tool) and ETL/Data Integration tools, implying a data warehouse focus.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India', suggesting a regional restriction for on-site or hybrid work.

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution details are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

relocation_required.evidence: Job is based in Pune, India, and no relocation package or requirement is mentioned.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship is mentioned, and the role is based in India where H1B is not applicable.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT or student visa support, and the role requires full-time education (MCA/M.Tech/B.Tech/B.E.).

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements are discussed in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is full-time, but no contract type (W2, C2C, etc.) is explicitly mentioned.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are listed in the Pass 1 extraction or job posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit or implied career growth paths or tracks are mentioned in the job posting.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Job posting mentions working with 'business and technical members of the team', which may include senior staff, but no formal mentorship program is stated.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion, advancement, or career progression paths in the job posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are explicitly or implicitly mentioned.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Job posting uses strict qualifiers like 'required', 'must have', and 'minimum of 3 years' for key skills and experience.

scope_definition.evidence: Job responsibilities are well-defined and focused on BI/DW projects, reporting, and visualization using Cognos.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Minimum 3 years of experience aligns with mid-level role expectations, and required skills are reasonable for the role.
